attributes.action: Hold a peoples vote on the options to leave the EU excluding remain as an option
attributes.additional_details: All options to leave debated by parliament should be put to the people. As a democratic country, we should have the option to choose how we leave as we are currently being led by a remain parliament trying to frustrate the leave process.
attributes.background: In 2016 the U.K. voted to leave the EU. Since then parliament has been unable to agree on a way to leave. Therefore, the options on how the U.K. leaves the EU should be put to the people. This is not another vote to leave or remain, as remain will not feature on the ballot.
